Shared future plans predict relationship satisfaction

Mieke and I are both in doubt about children, however, Mieke doesn't know her values.

I think this is true, in the sense that we have something to hang on to when times get tough. I haven't seen it studied empirically, so it could be a category for #research.

Test another! #research

We're like two people embarking on a project, and I want to contribute more than my fair share in making this project great. For the project to thrive the most, Shared future plans predict relationship satisfaction.
